import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import AdminDashboardForAll from "../AdminDashboardForAll"; import {FaStar, FaBackward, FaArrowDown, FaUpload} from "react-icons/fa"; import axios from "axios"; const UpdateBook = () =>{ let history = useHistory(); const { id } = useParams(); const [user, setUser] = useState({ bk_title:"", bk_author:"", bk_edition:"", bk_publisher:"", bk_publication_date:"", bk_copies:"", bk_category:"", bk_rack_no:"" }); const { bk_title, bk_author, bk_edition, bk_publisher, bk_publication_date, bk_copies, bk_category, bk_rack_no} = books; const onInputChange = (e) => { setBooks({ ...books, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; useEffect(() => { loadBooks(); }, []); const onSubmit = async e => { e.preventDefault(); await axios.put(`http://localhost:3003/users/${id}`, user); history.push("/"); }; const loadBooks = async () => { const result = await axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/books/${id}`); setUser(result.data); }; return( <>

); } export default UpdateBook;
